EmailTemplate.name: Jan 27th - Followup Q1 Partner Technical Call.Followup to Q1 Technical Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: Followup -Q1 Partner Technical Round Table Call
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> NCR Counterpoint Announcement Q1 Roundtable Deck and FAQs Hello All, Thank you to everyone who attended this quarter's Q1 Partner Technical Round Table Call. In case you missed it, don't worry! I have attached the summary of the FAQs (click here) <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?FolderId=9df66a#/doccenter/8e625590-e3ea-4e68-89ea-dfb2c541a033/doc/%252Fdd89ed8848-bd38-4c89-97cb-69f07c48a185%252Fdd2fdfaad0-1786-419f-8479-0e68e05f56b4%252Fdf33d86478-a2a4-49d9-a8fa-8813f2cc71c0%252Fdf7c864358-ad4b-4873-ad02-dd75ff92b870%252Fdf0a6bd584-a285-4bc3-8585-e20c59a8014b%252Fdf4c0c8edf-28eb-4788-ac59-37fcbd758918%252Flf664cc426-15ea-496b-bdf5-299f0cf8eabf/grid/?mode=view]]>  and the Deck (click here) <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?FolderId=9df66a#/doccenter/8e625590-e3ea-4e68-89ea-dfb2c541a033/doc/%252Fdd89ed8848-bd38-4c89-97cb-69f07c48a185%252Fdd2fdfaad0-1786-419f-8479-0e68e05f56b4%252Fdf33d86478-a2a4-49d9-a8fa-8813f2cc71c0%252Fdf7c864358-ad4b-4873-ad02-dd75ff92b870%252Fdf0a6bd584-a285-4bc3-8585-e20c59a8014b%252Fdf649d2340-11cd-4812-a16a-4d162b8b447e%252Fdf08fa1d82-c02c-4f92-85b0-67db42e96a50%252Flfa8f4fd51-e816-4858-a2ac-76b7260ffb63/grid/?mode=view]]> we used in the presentation. If you were able to attend, please help us improve these calls by filling out our survey here <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcd57Afx80mFGnGyXLCbxbOBUQVZHWks3MjNQSTlOSlc2VFNOQVkySDVFMi4u]]>. We look forward to seeing you at the next Quarter’s Counterpoint Technical Round Table within the month of April, 2020. The NCR Counterpoint Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
